TopicTitle: How do you type words on a video like danny

Articles.Content:
Hi you all, I didn't know ware to write this, but then thought one of you might know, sorry if I messed up, I'm still new at this.

So I'm making a YouTube video, and I want to display text on the screen but I don't know if you can do that with YouTube or if I'd need to get software for it. 

Thanks, Any will help more than welcome.

You mean you want text to appear in your video? Depends on your video editor. There should usually be something about adding subtitles that you can use. Or do you mean the "overlays" that appear over YouTube videos (often containing things like subscribe links)? That's a YouTube thing, in which case I can't help you.

Also, let me Google that for you.

Edited December 27, 2015 by Vaporo
